info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 5:11PM EDT until August 04 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 511 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Canton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Troy, Sylvania, Alba and Minnequa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
